segments.text: Hi , this is Sharon in Mr . Reynolds ’ s office . One of your delivery men picked up a package here about an hour ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , is there a problem ? Ma ’ am ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it still hasn ’ t reached its destination . I wonder if you could track it down for us . Mr . Reynolds is a bit concerned .
segments.speaker: S2
